review: We absolutely love our Amazon Fire TV. We bought it for ourselves for Christmas 2014, and have been watching movies, TV Series, etc. ever since.We also use it for all of our TV viewing, along with a special small window antenna that you purchase. We even recently bought a 2nd Fire TV for our bedroom television. It is so nice to be able to watch what you want when you want. All of the positive reviews on this device are accurate. We would highly recommend purchasing this to anyone considering it. Another great feature is the fact that it is voice activated. It couldn't get any easier.
author: Jody Benge

review: Best decision we have made is to get rid of cable and go to the Amazon Fire! It is fast and easy to use. My four year old can use it. Don't get the fire stick. It is slow and useless compare to the Fire TV. This beats Apple by a long shot.
